messages.content: I care about our NHS and I think you do too.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Restore the nursing bursary and recruit thousands of doctors and nurses to end the Tory NHS crisis. Focus on prevention measures to stop people getting sick and tackle health inequalities and prioritise children's health and wellbeing.

issues.brexitEurope: Lots of people think Brexit is the only thing that matters at this election, but there’s any number of other issues at stake too.
issues.health: I have worked in the NHS for 36 years, working hard to tackle health inequality. Cuts to the NHS has put huge pressure on resources putting up waiting times in A&E, for a GP and cancer urgent cancer treatment has trebled, we have the worst waiting times since records began, and the waiting list for operations has reached a record 4.4 million.

leaflet.personalStatement: My name is Tracey and I’m writing to you today because I care about our NHS and I think you do too. I have worked in the NHS for 36 years, working hard to tackle health inequality.

politicalExperience.achievements: Working hard to tackle health inequality.

images.caption: A woman with short hair smiling at the camera.
